Articles.Content: Can anyone draw the planets in human personas? I'm not asking too much. I also wanna see how they are seen by players. Also, I would like it in anime style.
Me confused- what is human personas?

Me confused- what is human personas?

You take an object or creature, and make it human-like. Just like anthrophormization(or whatever it's spelt like).

You take an object or creature, and make it human-like. Just like anthropomorphism(or whatever it's spelt like).

Fixed for you.

Also, the correct term is moe anthropomorphism, where you turn an inanimate object into some sort of human form.

This does not count animals, then it's just regular anthropomorphism. If it's a mammal, then it's a furry.

Fixed for you.

This does not count animals, then it's just regular anthropomorphism. If it's a mammal, then it's a furry.

How the heck do you turn a planet into human like? That would be really hard..

How the heck do you turn a planet into human like? That would be really hard..

Just stick a face to it.

Such orbits. Very vacuum.

How the heck do you turn a planet into human like? That would be really hard..

Something along these lines, I guess:

You guys are very confused.

I meant the characteristics of a planet turned into a human.

Like Eve is that psychotic girlfriend who will never let you leave.

Eeloo is that shy girl who nobody talks to, but trys to get them to.

Or Minmus is that playful girl who is very bubbly. Everyone likes her.

Laythe is that girl who loves to explore.

Kerbin is the social butterfly of the place. She seems to be the source of all the drama.

Moho is that girl with the hot temper. She can be rewarding if you're nice to her, but if you're not, she'll burn you.

The possibilities are endless ( Not really)!!!
I think he was referring to this http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moe_anthropomorphism

I spotted this thread while searching for that good ol' Kerbal geographic society thread(Or something like that).And turns out, after two years of Anime absence (Got into Hetalia and Gundam 00 recently), my anime character drawing skills have deteriorated to little toddler cartoon level. well maybe not that bad but you get the idea.

Working on Kerbol and Moho. got the ideas down. Took some ideas from Countryballs, Planetball, & Hetalia.

Dres is like Serbiaball, North Koreaball, and ISISball in one Kerbal/Human/Planet

And out, I can't make good anime Kerbals. I will do Anime Human versions first.

Edit: whoops, repost.

Edit #2: Due to my lack of patien- I mean, Lack of talent in finding things, can some kind soul please link the thread somewhere? Sorry if off topic.

Edit #3:

Kerbol is like some sort of all powerful god(Father). If one of his "kids" misbehave, he gives them a lesson (Kerbolar flares)

Moho is that wannabe cool kid. The youngest of the 6.5 planets, He always wears sunglasses and brags about his nonexistent awesomeness. Has two large holes on opposite sides of his house. Likes Pizza, Burgers, Baseball and Freedom. Hates Kerbol. Physical age of 18(Mental age much lower). (Also has a secret crush on Eve)

Eve is like that rich, popular girl who cares nothing about others. Has a purple mansion filled with purple furniture and purple explodium indoor waterfalls and pools and purple cloth and a slightly purple tan and a purple pet bird named gilly- whoops, gilly is brown. She is also a security freak and keeps all her prized possessions safe. Don't Even THINK about stealing anything from her. Also, never let her borrow your things. She won't give them back. Younger sister of Kerbin. Physical age of 22.

Kerbin is a geeky, Eco-crazy type of Kerbal, loves playing games like the Kerbals 3, Cities: Skyscrapers, Sid Kerman's Beyonnd Kerbin, Kerbal Space Program, that type of thing, and drives a eco-car that runs on Kerbolar panels, and her house is powered by a mini keothermal power plant. Likes taking hot baths in natural hot springs and watching KerTV. Has an Adopted little brother named Mun and adopted little Sister named Minmus. Physical age of 27.

Mun is a quiet, cold Kerbal who tries to avoid talking. He was found by Kerbin at the age of 5 in the streets of space, and immediately adopted him as a little brother. Mun likes cute things, and is okay with Kerbin's Kerbals, occasionally helping Kerbin throw their rockets.

Minmus is Kawaii ice person, desu desu.

Duna once lived in a huge mansion just slightly smaller than Eve's, and once had lush green forests and crystal clear blue rivers in her backyard, and once didn't have that annoying Talking Ike that constantly rants about pointless things like Independance and whiskey and Removing Duna from day to night. He had lost his empire due to that utter ....... Jool. At least he's friends with Kerbin. He once owned Egar, Pol, and Bop. Physical age of 26. (has a comlicated relationship with Kerbin too)

[Error 404: "Dres" not found]

Pouring out backup data log:

"REMOVE PLANET, DRESTEROIDS STRONK, KERBOLCHILDS WORST IDIOTS, YOU ALL ARE WORST PLANET THINGS, PLANETARY BOMBARDMENTS BEST DAYS OF LIFE, YOU STOOPID IGNORANT PLANETS, FEAR DRES, DRES STRONK, MINOR PLANETS BEST PLANETS, DWARF PLANET TRUE PLANET, balhh blah bllah rant cuss dres stronk remove planet asterlah ahkbob, blah blah..."

Jool is the Motherplanet (He's male tho). He crumbled Duna's Empire, and captured 5 other developing planets/moons to be part of his own Glorious Empire, known as the Union of Joolean Planetary Republics. The tallest, stronkest, and richest of the planets, he has massive wealth, clay, and potassium. Everyone else has inferior potassium. Mortal enemies with Duna, due to a "accidential Boulder falling on his house and killing one of his adopted cousins, Egar, while kidnapping the other two, Pol and Bop. Has sour relations with everyone but Laythe, Vall, and Tylo. Semi-AlliesPhysical age of 30.

Laythe was once her own planet, before she was captured by Jool to become part of his Empire. However, she is quite kind towards him, and supports his "Everyone will become one with Jool" cause. However, other than that, she behaves mostly normal, and likes doing things like watching anime and swimming in her. Acts as Jool's secretary. Physical age of 24.

Vall is the only other Jool Regime Supporter. Captured at a young age, he was influenced by Jool early on, thoguh she held on to some of his own practices. Likes dumplings and Hello Kerbal. Lives on a snowy mountain in Jool's HUGE Estate. Physical age of 21.

Tylo is like a sort of a neutral state. Has know real support or hate of the Jool regime, just sits in his yard looking at "his" property at the stock market online. Very empty minded and has no opinion on anything. The only thing he enjoys in life are eating and sleeping. But due to his mysteriousness and lack of outside interactions, nobody other than Jool goes near him. In ever. especially Kerbin. Has a vast fortune due to his secret job as a Venture Kapitolist. Only talks via email. Physical age of 28.

Bop is a scaredy-kerb. He was emotionally scarred after the death and "reincarnation" of his brother Egar, and fears for his younger brother Pol's life. Is scared whenever Jool is in sight. Gets frequent panic attacks, and can run ridiculously fast when frightened, but usually slow. Has a physical age of 14. Longs of returning to his attic Mansion-Room at Duna's old place.

Pol is a cheerful, unaware, and immature little kerb who often gets into trouble by accident.. acts as the "maid" of the estate. Is frightened by Jool, not because of Jool himself, but the scary stories his brother Bop tells him. Has a physical age of 9.

Eeloo is the filmer of the events of the Kerbolar System, mainly because nothing ever happens there. He sits in his lonely house up north and animates movies and TV series, as well as drawing his "friends" and pretending they are there. Lives in an colossal Igloo. Has a 21G Internet plan. His personality looks cheerful at first but is actually quite cold due to long periods of loneliness, getting occasional visits from some of Jool's servants. Physical age of 28.

EDIT #4: Sick right now, but I'm done with Moho and Eve. Also, description for Dres.

EDIt #5 Scrapping the kerbals, starting over with anime humans. This will take a while.

Edited August 13, 2015 by Rolanvorxariat
